001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DistanceSensor;
004import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.DistanceUnit;
005
006/**
007 * Class for range sensors
008 *
009 * @author Alex Stedman
010 */
011@Deprecated
012@SuppressWarnings("unused")
013public class Rev2MDistanceSensor extends Sensor<DistanceSensor> implements IDistanceSensor {
014
015    private DistanceUnit distanceUnit;
016
017    /**
018     * Create a range sensor
019     *
020     * @param device The sensor device
021     */
022    public Rev2MDistanceSensor(DistanceSensor device) {
023        super(device);
024    }
025
026    /**
027     * Create a range sensor
028     *
029     * @param deviceName The device name
030     */
031    public Rev2MDistanceSensor(String deviceName) {
032        super(deviceName);
033    }
034
035    /**
036     * Get the value with a specified distance Unit
037     *
038     * @param distanceUnit The unit
039     * @return The distance
040     */
041    @Override
042    public double getDistance(DistanceUnit distanceUnit) {
043        return getDevice().getDistance(distanceUnit);
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * Get the current distance unit
048     *
049     * @return The distance unit
050     */
051    @Override
052    public DistanceUnit getUnit() {
053        return distanceUnit;
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * Set the distance unit
058     *
059     * @param distanceUnit The unit
060     * @return This
061     */
062    @Override
063    public Rev2MDistanceSensor onUnit(DistanceUnit distanceUnit) {
064        this.distanceUnit = distanceUnit;
065        return this;
066    }
067}
